[![CurseForge](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/256822.svg?badge_style=for_the_badge)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ibe-editor)

## A simple GUI mod to edit an item, a block or an entity in your current world.

**For help with installation, usage and configuration of the mod, see
the [IBE Editor wiki](https://github.com/skyecodes/IBE-Editor/wiki).**

You can also join us on [Discord](https://discord.gg/kv2YGxweUj)!

### Download the mod

The mod is available to download on [CurseForge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ibe-editor),
[Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/ibe-editor) and [GitHub](https://github.com/skyecodes/IBE-Editor/releases).  
It is compatible
with [Forge](https://files.minecraftforge.net), [NeoForge](https://neoforged.net/), [Fabric](https://fabricmc.net/)
and [Quilt](https://quiltmc.org) mod loaders.

The Forge and NeoForge versions of the mod require [KotlinForForge](https://modrinth.com/mod/kotlin-for-forge).  
The Fabric and Quilt versions of the mod require [Fabric API](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-language-kotlin)
and [Fabric Language Kotlin](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-language-kotlin).

### Build the mod

The mod is built using the [Architectury](https://github.com/architectury) toolchain.  
Building the mod requires Java 17 (or higher).

```shell
git clone https://github.com/skyecodes/IBE-Editor.git
cd IBE-Editor
chmod +x gradlew
./gradlew build
```

You will find the mod JARs in the `forge/build/libs`, `neoforge/build/libs` and `fabric/build/libs` directories.
